title: SOLD 1909 T206 Cy Young Glove Shows Sweet Caporal SGC AUTH

posts.post_title: SOLD 1909 T206 Cy Young Glove Shows Sweet Caporal SGC AUTH
posts.post_content: Graded Authentic due to paper loss on corners, deemed to be altered.  No bends or creases, clean back, newly graded by SGC.   Paypal Friends and Family payment preferred.  Insured Priority Mail Shipping is included.   Thanks for considering.  Len
PM sent a few minutes ago. Thank you.
